sentences.en: As soon as she starts crying, I'm putty in her hands.
sentences.cn: 只要她一哭, 我就对她百依百顺.

sentences.en: Every crevice in these walls has been filled with putty.
sentences.cn: 这几堵墙的每个裂缝都用油灰补塞上了.

sentences.en: He was like putty in her hands.
If you have ever played with Silly Putty, you can use clay.
sentences.cn: 如果你曾用过油灰, 你就可以使用研磨泥.

sentences.en: Punch in the nails and then fill the holes flush with putty.
sentences.cn: 把钉子钉进去，然后再用油灰把洞抹平。

sentences.en: Putty like, not flow on vertical surface, aggressave chemicals resistance.
sentences.cn: 胶泥状, 立面不流淌,耐各种强酸 、 强碱腐蚀.

sentences.en: Q: Will the Light - Curing Putty be cured under UV light?
sentences.cn: 问: 光硬化 补土将会在紫外线光之下固化 吗 ?

sentences.en: Seal the external side of wall - through hole with sealant, putty, paint, etc.
sentences.cn: 用密封胶泥或油灰涂料等物封住室外侧的穿墙孔.

sentences.en: She was a woman of such beauty and charm that men were putty in her hands.
sentences.cn: 她美艳绝伦,男人在她手心任其摆布.

sentences.en: The hole has been stopped up with putty.
The mixture of Putty and Hardener should be used up before gelling.
sentences.cn: 原子灰与固化剂混合后,要在凝固前使用完毕.

sentences.en: The putty gives a good seal round the window.
sentences.cn: 窗户四周泥的油灰密封效果很好.

sentences.en: There are miscellaneous tools, pliers , putty knife, polarity stamps, battery stamping or coding equipment, lead cutters.
sentences.cn: 有各种工具 、 手钳 、 油灰刀, 极性印戮 、 电他标记打印或编号机 、 铅切刀.

sentences.en: Waiter: Well, then, its peach. The apple pie tastes like putty.
sentences.cn: 侍者: 噢, 那是桃馅饼; 苹果馅饼的味道象油灰.

sentences.en: We all loathe people who are like putty in the leaders'hand.
sentences.cn: 我们都不喜欢对领导惟命是从的人.

sentences.en: When the clay feels like putty, it is ready to use.
sentences.cn: 黏土摸起来像油灰时，就可以用了。

phrases.tran_cn: n. [物]氧化锡粉（等于油灰粉）

trans.tran_en: a soft whitish substance that becomes hard when it dries and that is used to fix glass into window frames
